Posts.Content: Johannegrammy wrote: I am 56 years old and found a small lump under my right breast and within 3 weeks this tender lump took over my breast it is swollen kind of red and itchy nipple i am worried about breast cancer i had a lumpectomy about 7 years ago in my left breast but nothing since then, there is breast cancer and different type of cancer history in my family The info I am finding suggests cysts but I have been in menopause since I was 50 so not sure Anyone going through the same thing? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Just worried Johannegrammy Johannegrammy
